inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of male Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome Type III
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pelvic pain duration of at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Urinary tract infection within the last year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Antiviral therapy or antibiotics within the last 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently taking any medications or recreational drugs containing nitrates 3A4 inhibitors such as erythromycin, ketoconazole, or itraconazole
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Alpha-blocker therapy for treatment of high blood pressure or prostate problems
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Suffered a heart attack, stroke or life-threatening arrhythmia within the last months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of hyperlipidemia in his mother and MI in his father. He smokes 15 cigarettes per day and drinks a beer per day.
